description:
This Corporate Plan reflects a change of attitudes, structures, policies, and resource allocations that are closely aligned with the Government of Vanuatuâ€™s overall policy framework.

The Ministry of Education and Training is committed to deliver and improve on these three key objectives;
The corporate plan builds on the three key objectives of the interim sector strategy, and that is to;

* Improve the quality of education
* Increase equitable access to education for all people at all levels of education in Vanuatu; and
* Improve planning, fiscal and financial management

The corporate plan will guide the Ministry of Education and Training to achieve end results that are outlined in the MoET corporate planning logic. The corporate plan also has and inbuilt results framework to measure progress against the intended results.
name: Corporate Plan 2018-2020
